# ðŸ“Š Sub-Issue: Real-Time Community Analytics Dashboard

## Goal
Build a real-time analytics dashboard for community owners and moderators, showing member growth, engagement metrics, content performance, and member statistics.

## Tasks
- [ ] Design backend analytics service and Prisma schema changes
- [ ] Implement analytics endpoints for member growth, engagement, and content performance
- [ ] Create frontend dashboard components (charts, tables, heatmaps)
- [ ] Add export functionality (CSV/PDF)
- [ ] Integrate role-based access for owners/moderators
- [ ] Write unit/integration tests for analytics aggregation

## Acceptance Criteria
- Dashboard displays all metrics described in the [parent issue](./community-engagement-core.md)
- Data updates in real-time or near real-time
- Owners and moderators have tailored views
- Tests cover >80% of analytics logic
